thread.title: Ground News - Tracking tag leads cops to stolen e-bike, scooter loot
thread.title_full: Ground News - Tracking tag leads cops to stolen e-bike, scooter loot

author: The West Australian
title: Ground News - Tracking tag leads cops to stolen e-bike, scooter loot
text:
Summary by The West Australian Police have recovered $30,000 worth of stolen e-bikes and electronic scooters after a tracking tag led them to the loot. Share menu More
Filters 2 Articles 2 Articles All Left Center Right
The West Australian Lean Right High Factuality Individual: Kerry Stokes Tracking tag leads cops to stolen e-bike, scooter loot Police have recovered $30,000 worth of stolen e-bikes and electronic scooters after a tracking tag led them to the loot.
